newsUpdates.title: Arjo Atayde, Maine Mendoza spend quality time in El Nido
newsUpdates.content: Celebrity couple Arjo Atayde and Maine Mendoza took time off their schedules to spend one-on-one time in El Nido, Palawan. On their respective Instagram accounts, Arjo and Maine marked their recent island vacation with sweet posts dedicated to each other. The “Cattleya Killer” actor expressed his love for his girlfriend of three years by writing, “I love you in all ways, more and more... everyday ❤️”
